Personal website of Zixuan Chen
  • Publications

    Zixuan Chen (陈子轩)

    Third year PhD student at NEU

    • Boston, USA
    • Google Scholar
    • GitHub

    I am a third year PhD student at Northeastern University. I am glad to be a member of the Data Lab and advised by Prof. Mirek Riedewald.

    My current reasearch interest focuses on explanations in databases, especially in rankings. For example, our recent project proposes why-not-yet problems by asking why-not questions in the context of top-k rankings and consider them satisfiability or optimization problems.

    Publications

    • Why Not Yet: Fixing a Top-k Ranking that Is Not Fair to Individuals
      Zixuan Chen, Panagiotis Manolios, Mirek Riedewald
      PVLDB 16(9) (VLDB 2023)
    • SANTOS: Relationship-based Semantic Table Union Search
      Aamod Khatiwada, Grace Fan, Roee Shraga, Zixuan Chen, Wolfgang Gatterbauer, Renée J. Miller, Mirek Riedewald
      PACMMOD 1(1) (SIGMOD 2023)
    • 一种基于树分解的图上点区间编码方法及应用
      陈子轩， 何震瀛， 荆一楠
      计算机应用与软件 39(3)
    • A Fast Automated Model Selection Approach Based on Collaborative Knowledge
      Zhenyuan Sun, Zixuan Chen, Zhenying He, Yinan Jing, X. Sean Wan
      DASFAA 2020
